attributes.additional_details: Lower airport parking charges can greatly benefit both travellers and airport authorities. By reducing the cost of parking at airports, travellers are able to save money and allocate those funds towards other aspects of their trip. This may lead to increased passenger satisfaction and loyalty. Additionally, lower parking charges can also attract more customers to choose airport parking over alternative transportation options, increasing revenue for the airport.
attributes.background: Lower all airport parking charges to an affordable rate for everyone. The increases in charges is more than the rate of inflation.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about charges for airport services are a matter for individual airports, not the Government or Parliament.
